```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)
```

## Graph for induction questions

```{r}
data <- read.csv("../data_Participants.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)

induction_data <- data %>%
  select(starts_with("Induction_Q"))

ggplot(data = induction_data)+
  geom_bar(mapping = aes(y = Induction_Q) +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::percent)

```
